title: Chests
body: So I have 4 s chests and have made a key with 3 fragments. but i don't know how to open the chest with the key. Any help?

replies.body:
As long as you have a key, you should be able to simply select your chest and open it.  You don't have to combine the two together!  It works just the same as the new player or day one chests that you obtained at level 5.  

Looking into your account, though, I wasn't able to find any chests on your account.  You'll need to get some, through RP or mastery chests per the [hextech crafting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) guide.  Let me know if that helps!
